IncidentDef.label: Replimat Spill
IncidentDef.letterText: A Replimat Terminal has malfunctioned, spilling nutrient feedstock everywhere.

IncidentDef.label: Replimat Malfunction
IncidentDef.letterText: A Replimat Terminal has malfunctioned, producing large quantities of animal feed.

IncidentDef.label: Replimat Food Poisoning
IncidentDef.letterText: A Replimat Terminal has malfunctioned, and [[PawnName]] has contracted food poisoning from an improperly replicated meal.
